## NOAA data

Loading libraries

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
library(rnoaa)
library(p8105.datasets)
library(plotly)
```

Loading data
```{r}
data = 
  ny_noaa |> 
  drop_na() |> 
  separate(date, into = c("year", "month", "day"), "-") |> 
  mutate(
    tmax = as.numeric(tmax),
    tmin = as.numeric(tmin),
    prcp = as.numeric(prcp),
    snow = as.numeric(snow)
  ) |> 
  filter(year == 2000 | year == 2002 | year == 2004 | 
           year == 2006 | year == 2008 | year == 2010) |> 
  group_by(year, month) |> 
  summarize(
    mean_prcp = mean(prcp),
    mean_snow = mean(snow),
    mean_tmax = mean(tmax),
    mean_tmin = mean(tmin)
  )
```
